description: This file defines the main FastAPI application for the Jira-Confluence integration backend. It includes endpoints for health checks, user management, OAuth flows for Jira and Confluence, connecting and fetching projects/pages, and managing JIRA and Confluence entities. It also sets up middleware and integrates routes related to OAuth authorization.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] _ocean_response(data: Any, message: str = "ok")
methods.description: Wraps API responses in a standardized envelope with status, message, and data.

methods.name: health_check()
methods.description: Health check endpoint indicating the service is operational.

methods.name: jira_login( state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None, return_url: Optional[str] = None, )
methods.description: Initiates the OAuth login flow for Jira by redirecting the client to Atlassian's authorization URL.

methods.name: jira_callback(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Handles the OAuth callback from Jira, exchanges code for tokens, stores tokens for the first user, and redirects to frontend.

methods.name: create_user_endpoint(payload: UserCreate, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Creates a new user or retrieves existing user based on email, returning user data.

methods.name: list_users_endpoint(db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Returns a list of all users; public endpoint.

methods.name: get_user_endpoint(user_id: int, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieves a user by ID, or returns 404 if not found.

methods.name: confluence_login(state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Starts OAuth login flow for Confluence.

methods.name: confluence_callback(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Completes OAuth flow for Confluence, exchanging code for tokens and storing them for the first user.

methods.name: connect_jira(db=Depends(get_db), payload: UserCreate | None = None)
methods.description: Guides the user to start OAuth login for Jira, updating user's base URL.

methods.name: connect_confluence(db=Depends(get_db), payload: UserCreate | None = None)
methods.description: Guides the user to start OAuth login for Confluence, updating user's base URL.

methods.name: fetch_jira_projects(db=Depends(get_db), owner_id: int | None = None)
methods.description: Placeholder to fetch stored JIRA projects for a user; does not query Jira directly.

methods.name: fetch_confluence_pages(db=Depends(get_db), owner_id: int | None = None)
methods.description: Placeholder to fetch stored Confluence pages for a user; does not query Confluence directly.

methods.name: upsert_jira_project_endpoint(payload: JiraProjectCreate, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Create or update a JIRA project associated with a user.

methods.name: list_jira_projects_endpoint(owner_id: int, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: List all JIRA projects for a specified user.

methods.name: upsert_confluence_page_endpoint(payload: ConfluencePageCreate, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Create or update a Confluence page for a specified user.

methods.name: list_confluence_pages_endpoint(owner_id: int, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: List all Confluence pages for a specified user.

ctags.name: confluence_callback
ctags.pattern: /^async def confluence_callback(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, /
ctags.signature: (request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: confluence_login
ctags.pattern: /^def confluence_login(state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None):$/

ctags.name: jira_callback
ctags.pattern: /^async def jira_callback(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state:/
ctags.signature: (request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: jira_login
ctags.signature: ( state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None, return_url: Optional[str] = None, )
